## IFontConfig interface

Configures the font for a label.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IFontConfig 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [color?](./chart-def.ifontconfig.color.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Color of the font. |
|  [family?](./chart-def.ifontconfig.family.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Font family for the label. |
|  [size?](./chart-def.ifontconfig.size.md) | string | <i>(Optional)</i> Font size for the label. |
|  [weight?](./chart-def.ifontconfig.weight.md) | string \| number | <i>(Optional)</i> Font weight for the label. |
